alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 19 at 9:47AM EDT until April 19 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EDT TODAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and a light glaze of ice...mainly in the higher elevations. * WHERE...Lackawanna county. * WHEN...Until noon EDT today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Scattered power outages are still possible where heavy, wet snow accumulations occurred even as snow moves out.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorist to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadways, and traffic conditions.
